title: players spits the dummy
body: i can't stand people giving  a lot of crap to u not very helpful in a way and rude  and  they like to give a mouth full to u but when you dish it back all they got to say report , report  this person  and they spilt the dummy when you ask them who to ban and you go ahead and ban the ones that want to use to play  and then they say report  you .... come on riot {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: u spitting the dummy right now son
wtf...... dude  whats your problem  im saying thats what other people do {{champion:9}}
Just mute shit talkers. Give them some logic also while they are muted. Make it so their balls actually finally drop. Feels good man.
